airhockeyjava.util

Class LineVectorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • airhockeyjava.util.LineVectorUtils

  • public class LineVectorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class providing methods for working with both java.awt and the optimized math classes. Although we want to minimize the number of times we switch between types, each has specific advantages/disadvantages and we need an efficient way of converting.
    Author:
    Joshua Segeren
